detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Counsel
detailsData.content: With over 35 years of practice, successful jury trial experience, and numerous multi-million dollar judgments, we pursue our clients' interests with personalized attention and creative strategies.

detailsData.title: Specialized Practice Areas
detailsData.content: Focused on eminent domain, inverse condemnation, and dangerous conditions, our firm offers knowledge and experience to major corporations, developers, family-owned businesses, and individuals.

detailsData.title: Results-Oriented Philosophy
detailsData.content: Emphasizing advocacy, results, and peace of mind, we work with clients to achieve their goals through innovative and creative solutions.

address: 633 West Fifth Street, 26th Floor, Los Angeles, CA 90071
subHeading: You Have Rights; We Protect Them.
valueProp: Peterson Law Group represents California real estate and business owners in litigation and trial of matters affecting their property rights. Our well-established firm holds a successful reputation garnered from many years of representing clients in complex property disputes.

testimonalData.text: Peterson Law Group provided exceptional legal representation for my property dispute. Their expertise and dedication were truly impressive.
testimonalData.author: Jane Doe

testimonalData.text: I was amazed by the results Peterson Law Group achieved for my eminent domain case. They are truly the best in the business.
testimonalData.author: John Smith

testimonalData.text: The team at Peterson Law Group went above and beyond to protect my property rights. I highly recommend their services to anyone in need of legal assistance.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
